main.java.com.greendev.pragma.database
Class DbManager

java.lang.Object
  main.java.com.greendev.pragma.database.DbManager

public class DbManager
extends java.lang.Object

DBMananger: Provides communication with a database. This class provides methods for reading goes variables from, and store goes data sets and store goes maps image paths in the database. The use of this class works with a connection object so it is database driver independent.

Author:
josediaz

Method Detail

readGoesVariables

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> readGoesVariables()
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Reads goes variables from the GoesVariable table. This should be the first method to call when using dbManager class

Returns:
The list of goes variables found in the database.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

storeGoesData

public int storeGoesData(java.lang.String goesVariableName,
                         java.io.File csvFile,
                         org.joda.time.DateTime date)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.io.FileNotFoundException
Stores GOES variable records in the database. It requires a goes variable name and corresponding csv file in order to insert.

Parameters:
goesVariableName - The name of the goes variable to insert.
csvFile - The csv file to insert in database
date - The date for which the storeGoesData method was ran
Returns:
true if storing the data was successful
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - Error inserting the records in database
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Error working with the CSV

storeGoesMap

public int storeGoesMap(java.util.List<java.lang.String> variableList,
                        java.io.File directory,
                        org.joda.time.DateTime date)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Store GoesMaps in database. It requires a list of variables of which maps will be generated for and inserted in the database.

Parameters:
variableList - Variables for which maps will be inserted into the database
directory - The directory path to the map images
date - The date of the insertion
Returns:
The number of records inserted to the database
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
